author: Universal Pictures
description:
Edward Wilson (Matt Damon) goes head-to-head with Professor Fredericks (Michael Gambon), testing both his loyalty and moral code in one cold, calculated move. 

Buy/Rent The Good Shepherd!   
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lmR_HG5NtlM
Prime Video: https://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_noss_1?url=search-alias%3Dinstant-video&field-keywords=The%20Good%20Shepherd
Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/s?k=025192867125&ref=nb_sb_noss
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: https://www.uphe.com/movies/the-good-shepherd

A top CIA operative and founding member of America’s intelligence service is pulled deeper into a world of secrets, betrayal, and sacrifice — as he uncovers just how much loyalty to country can cost a man and his family.

© 2006 Universal Pictures. All Rights Reserved.
Cast: Matt Damon, Angelina Jolie, Robert De Niro, Alec Baldwin, William Hurt
Produced By: James G. Robinson, Francis Ford Coppola, Robert De Niro
Directed By: Robert De Niro

title: The Good Shepherd | Matt Damon Outsmarts the Professor
